status = float(evt.message.split()[-1]) state = {0:'Unknown',1:'Other',2:'OK',3:'Degraded',4:'Stressed',5:'Predictive Failure',6:'Error',7:'Non-Recoverable Error',8:'Starting',9:'Stopping',10:'Stopped',11:'In Service',12:'No Contact',13:'Lost Communication',14:'Aborted',15:'Dormant',16:'Supporting Entity in Error',17:'Completed',18:'Power Mode'}.get(status, 'Unknown') evt.summary = "%s (%s)"%(evt.message, state) evt.severity = {0:3,1:3,2:0,3:4,4:3,5:3,6:4,7:5,8:2,9:3,10:4,11:2,12:3,13:4,14:4,15:3,16:4,17:0,18:3}.get(status, 3) if evt.firstTime == evt.lastTime: device.os.drgroups._getOb(evt.component).state = state txnCommit()
